ref: The strategic lazy incremental copy graph (SLING) unification method combines two incremental copy graph unification methods: the lazy incremental copy graph (LING) unification method and the strategic incremental copy graph (SING) unification method.
Incremental Copy Graph Unification PROCEDURE Unify(node1, node2) node1 = Dereference(nodel).
Ile proposed an incremental copy graph unification method to avoid over copying and early copying.
